A futuristic city where skyscrapers are grown from a single seed, each one a unique, self-sustaining ecosystem with its own climate, flora, and fauna.
A world where memories can be extracted from one's mind and stored in a physical form, allowing people to relive and share their experiences in vivid detail.
A society where technology has advanced to the point where humans can upload their consciousness into a virtual reality, but at the cost of their physical bodies becoming mere husks.
A mystical realm where time is currency, and people trade years of their lives for material possessions and experiences.
A planet where the inhabitants have evolved to become living, breathing manifestations of their deepest fears, with the ability to shape-shift and adapt to their surroundings.
